Uses of Package
nl.inl.blacklab.search

  • Packages that use nl.inl.blacklab.search 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.externalstorage
    Deals with storing the original content in UTF-16 for quickly making concordances.
    nl.inl.blacklab.index
    Classes related to indexing.
    nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex
    Classes for dealing with complex fields (having multiple properties for each token).
    nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument
    Classes for dealing with per-document resultsets (instead of per-hits resultsets, which BlackLab mostly deals with)
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.contextql  
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.corpusql
    Parser for Corpus Query Language.
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.lucene
    Parser for Lucene Query Language that produces TextPattern's instead of Query's.
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.lucene.helpers
    Some helper classes for the Lucene Query Language parser.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping
    Classes for grouping hits.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene
    Our own extensions to Lucene, used by BlackLab.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.sequences
    Classes dealing with regex-like patterns of token-level queries, like required for CorpusQL.
    nl.inl.blacklab.tools
    Package for tool applications.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.externalstorage 
    Class and Description
    ContentAccessor
    Defines a way to access the original indexed content.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.index 
    Class and Description
    Searcher
    The main interface into the BlackLab library.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.index.complex 
    Class and Description
    IndexStructure
    Determines the structure of a BlackLab index.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument 
    Class and Description
    Hit
    Class for a hit.
    Hits
    Represents a list of Hit objects.
    Searcher
    The main interface into the BlackLab library.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.contextql 
    Class and Description
    CompleteQuery
    Represents a combination of a contents query (a TextPattern) and a metadata "filter query" (a regular Lucene Query).
    IndexStructure
    Determines the structure of a BlackLab index.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.corpusql 
    Class and Description
    IndexStructure
    Determines the structure of a BlackLab index.
    TextPattern
    Describes some pattern of words in a content field.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.lucene 
    Class and Description
    TextPattern
    Describes some pattern of words in a content field.
    TextPatternBoolean
    A TextPattern that performs document-level combining of boolean clauses.
    TPBooleanClause
    Adapted from Lucene's BooleanClause.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.lucene.helpers 
    Class and Description
    QueryExecutionContext
    Represents the current "execution context" for executing a TextPattern query.
    TextPattern
    Describes some pattern of words in a content field.
    TextPatternTranslator
    Interface for translating a TextPattern into a different representation.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.search 
    Class and Description
    CompleteQuery
    Represents a combination of a contents query (a TextPattern) and a metadata "filter query" (a regular Lucene Query).
    Concordance
    A concordance (left context, hit text, right context).
    Hit
    Class for a hit.
    Hits
    Represents a list of Hit objects.
    HitsWindow
    Represents a subset of a Hits object, for example a page of hits.
    IndexStructure
    Determines the structure of a BlackLab index.
    IndexStructure.AltDesc
    Description of a property alternative
    IndexStructure.AltType
    Types of property alternatives
    IndexStructure.ComplexFieldDesc
    Description of a complex field
    IndexStructure.FieldType
    Possible types of metadata fields.
    IndexStructure.PropertyDesc
    Description of a property
    Kwic
    A "keyword in context" for a hit (left context, hit text, right context).
    QueryExecutionContext
    Represents the current "execution context" for executing a TextPattern query.
    Searcher
    The main interface into the BlackLab library.
    TextPattern
    Describes some pattern of words in a content field.
    TextPatternCombiner
    Abstract base class for combining several text patterns into a single new compound TextPattern
    TextPatternTerm
    A TextPattern matching a word.
    TextPatternTranslator
    Interface for translating a TextPattern into a different representation.
    TokenFrequency
    One token and its frequency in some context.
    TokenFrequencyList
    A collection of tokens and their (absolute) frequencies.
    TPBooleanClause
    Adapted from Lucene's BooleanClause.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping 
    Class and Description
    Hit
    Class for a hit.
    Hits
    Represents a list of Hit objects.
    Searcher
    The main interface into the BlackLab library.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene 
    Class and Description

    Class and Description
    Hit
    Class for a hit.
    QueryExecutionContext
    Represents the current "execution context" for executing a TextPattern query.
    TextPattern
    Describes some pattern of words in a content field.
    TextPatternAnd
    AND query for combining different properties from a complex field.
    TextPatternCombiner
    Abstract base class for combining several text patterns into a single new compound TextPattern
    TextPatternTranslator
    Interface for translating a TextPattern into a different representation.
